Method Detail

fix

protected void fix(int index)
Description copied from class: BinarySearchTree.Node
This method is called when a structural change occured (e.g. during an insert()- or remove()-operation)) in one of the subtrees. In a BinarySearchTree-Object this method has nothing to do. It is usually overwritten in subclasses.
Overrides:
fix in class BinarySearchTree.Node
Tags copied from class: BinarySearchTree.Node
Parameters:
index -  
See Also:
AVLTree, RedBlackTree

designate

protected void designate(BinarySearchTree.Node next)
Description copied from class: BinarySearchTree.Node
This method has to be implemented in case that a rotation invalidates information of the Node. This method should copy the information from this Node to the Node next. In a BinarySearchTree-Object this method has nothing to do. It is usually overwritten in subclasses.
Overrides:
designate in class BinarySearchTree.Node
Tags copied from class: BinarySearchTree.Node
Parameters:
next - destination for the rotation information.
See Also:
AVLTree, RedBlackTree
